action.name: Set text
action.param: "Doa harian by Bagian kurikulum KMI Darussalam Gontor"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "BG Designed by valadzionak_volha & starline and mosque & house asset by rawpixel.com & pch.vector on freepik.com"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Sayang sekali, hafalanmu masih kurang.. ayo menghafal lebih giat lagi."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Hafalanmu lumayan cukup, tetapi masih perlu diperbaiki. ayo hafal lebih giat lagi."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Wah, hafalanmu cukup bagus, tetapi belum sempurna. ayo hafal lebih giat lagi."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Waw, hafalanmu bagus sekali, kamu berhasil menghafal dengan baik...."

action.name: Set text
action.param: ". بِاسْمِكَ اللَّهُمَّ أَحْيَا وَ بِاسْمِكَ أَمُوْتُ"

action.name: Set text
action.param: ". الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ الَّذِي أَحْيَاناَ بَعْـدَ مَا أَمَاتَنَا وَإِلَيْهِ النُّشُوْرِ"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Alhamdulillahil ladzi ahyana ba'dama amatana wa ilayhin nusyur"

action.name: Set text
action.param: ". اَللهُمَّ اِنّىْ اَعُوْذُبِكَ مِنَ الْخُبُثِ وَالْخَبَآئِثِ"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Allahumma inni audzu bika minal khubutsi wal khabaits"

action.name: Set text
action.param: ". الْحَمْدُ ِللهِ الَّذِىْ اَذْهَبَ عَنّى اْلاَذَى وَعَافَانِىْ"

action.name: Set text
action.param: ". بِسْمِ اللهِ وَلَجْنَا وَبِسْمِ اللهِ خَرَجْنَا وَعَلَى رَبِّنَا تَوَكَّلْنَا"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Bismillaahi wa lajnaa wa bismillaahi kharajnaa wa 'alaa rabbinaa tawakkalna"

action.name: Set text
action.param: ". بِسْمِ اللهِ تَوَكَّلْتُ عَلَى اللهِ لاَحَوْلَ وَلاَقُوَّةَ اِلاَّ بِاللهِ"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Bismillahi tawakkaltu 'alallaahi laa haula wa laa quwwata illaa billaah"

action.name: Set text
action.param: ". اَللّهُمَّ اغْفِرْلِي ذُنُوْبِي وَافْتَحْ لِيْ اَبْوَابَ رَحْمَتِكَ"

action.name: Set text
action.param: ". اَللّهُمَّ اغْفِرْلِي ذُنُوْبِي وَافْتَحْ لِيْ اَبْوَابَ فَضْلِكَ"

action.name: Set text
action.param: ". الَّلهُمَّ بَارِكْ لَنَا فِيمَا رَزَقْتَنَا وَقِنَا عَذَابَ النَّارِ"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Allahumma baarik lana fiima razaqtanaa wa qinaa 'adzaaban naar"

action.name: Set text
action.param: ". اَلْحَمْدُ ِللهِ الَّذِيْ اَطْعَمَنَا وَسَقَانَا وَجَعَلَنَا مِنَ الْمُسْلِمِيْنَ"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Alhamdulillahil ladzii ath'amanaa wa saqaanaa wa ja'alanaa minal muslimiin"

action.name: Set text
action.param: ". اَللَّهُـمَّ كَمَا حَسَّـنْتَ خَلْقِـيْ فَحَسِّـنْ خُلُقِـيْ"

action.name: Set text
action.param: ". الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ الَّذِى كَسَانِى هَذَا الثَّوْبَ وَرَزَقَنِيهِ مِنْ غَيْرِ حَوْلٍ مِنِّى وَلاَ قُوَّةٍ"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Alhamdulillahil ladzii kasaanii hadzats tsauba wa razaqaniihi min ghairi haulin minnii wa laa quwwah"

action.name: Set text
action.param: ". اَللهُمَّ بِكَ اَصْبَحْنَا وَبِكَ اَمْسَيْنَا وَبِكَ نَحْيَا وَبِكَ نَمُوْتُ وَاِلَيْكَ النُّشُوْرُ"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Allahumma bika ashbahnaa wa bika amsaynaa wa bika nahyaa wa bika namuutu wa ilaykan nusyuur"

action.name: Set text
action.param: ". اَللهُمَّ بِكَ اَمْسَيْنَا وَبِكَ اَصْبَحْنَا وَبِكَ نَحْيَا وَبِكَ نَمُوْتُ وَاِلَيْكَ الْمَصِيْرُ"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Allahumma bika amsaynaa wa bika ashbahnaa wa bika nahyaa wa bika namuutu wa ilaikal mashiir"

action.name: Set text
action.param: " اللَّهُمَّ قَدِ اسْتَوْدَعْنَاكَ مَا عَلَّمْتَنَاهُ فَارْدُدْهُ إِلَيْنَا عِنْدَ حَاجَاتِنَا إِلَيْهِ وَ لَا تُنْسِنَا عَنْهُ يَا رَبَّ العَالَمِيْنَ"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "ِAllahumma qodis tauda'naaka maa 'allamtanaahu fardudhu ilaynaa 'inda haajaatinaa ilayhi wa laa tunsinaa 'anhu yaa rabbal 'aalamiin"

action.name: Set text
action.param: ". نَوَيْتُ ﺍﻟْﻮُﺿُﻮْﺀَ ﻟِﺮَﻓْﻊِ ﺍﻟْﺤَﺪَﺙِ ﺍْﻻَﺻْﻐَﺮِ ﻓَﺮْﺿًﺎ ِﻟﻠﻪِ ﺗَﻌَﺎﻟَﻰ"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Nawaytul wudhu-a liraf'il hadatsil ashghari fardhan lillaahi ta'aala"

action.name: Set text
action.param: ". اَقَامَهَا اللهُ وَاَدَامَهَا مَادَامَتِ السَّمَوَاتُ وَاْلاَرْضُ"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Aqaamaha llaahu wa adaamahaa maa daamatis samawaatu wal ardh"

action.name: Set text
action.param: ". أَشْهَدُ اَنْ لاَ اِلَهَ إِلاَّ اللهُ وَحْدَهُ لاَ شَرِيْكَ لَهُ وَأَشْهَدُ أَنَّ مُحَمَّدًا عَبْدُهُ وَرَسُوْلُهُ. اَللّٰهُمَّ اجْعَلْنِىْ مِنَ التَّوَّابِيْنَ وَاجْعَلْنِىْ مِنَ الْمُتَطَهِّرِيْنَ، وَاجْعَلْنِيْ مِنْ عِبَادِكَ الصَّالِحِيْنَ"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Asyhadu allaa ilaaha illallah wahdahu laa syariikalahu .Wa asyhadu anna Muhammadan ’abduhu wa rasuuluhu. Allahummaj alnii minat tawwabiina waj alnii minal mutathohhiriina waj alnii min ‘ibaadikas shaalihiin"

action.name: Set text
action.param: " اَللَّهُمَّ رَبَّ هَذِهِ الدَّعْوَةِ التَّآمَّةِ وَالصَّلاَةِ الْقَآئِمَةِ آتِ مُحَمَّدَانِ الْوَسِيْلَةَ وَالْفَضِيْلَةَ وَالشَّرَفَ وَالدَّرَجَةَ الْعَالِيَةَ الرَّفِيْعَةَ وَابْعَثْهُ مَقَامًا مَحْمُوْدَانِ الَّذِىْ وَعَدْتَهُ اِنَّكَ لاَ تُخْلِفُ الْمِيْعَادَ"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Allaahumma robba haadzihid da’watit taammah, washsholaatil qoo-imah, aati muhammadanil washiilata wal fadhiilah, wasysyarofa, wad darajatal, ‘aaliyatar rofii’ah, wab’atshu maqoomam mahmuudanil ladzii wa’adtah, innaka laa tukhliful mii’aad"
